title: Data (Use and Access) Act 2025
summary: An Act to make provision about access to customer data and business data; to regulate the processing and sharing of information relating to identifiable individuals; to establish the Information Commission; to make provision about privacy, electronic communications, copyright-protected works, and the development of artificial intelligence systems; and for connected purposes.

title: The National Security and Investment Act 2021 (Notifiable Acquisition) (Specification of Qualifying Entities) Regulations 2021
summary: These Regulations specify descriptions of qualifying entities for the purposes of mandatory notification under the National Security and Investment Act 2021.

title: Directive (EU) 2019/1024 on open data and the re-use of public sector information
summary: Directive governing access to and re-use of public sector information across the European Union.
ai_relevance: Establishes rules on access to and re-use of public sector data, which may be used as input for artificial intelligence systems.
